short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin and organize your ChatGPT conversations into folders for a clutter-free experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PinFold helps you effortlessly organize and manage your ChatGPT conversations, ensuring you never lose track of important chats. With PinFold, you can pin essential chats for instant access and categorize them into organized folders, creating a seamless, clutter-free experience that enhances your productivity.
